https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p8RVrULtKSXBOWW4nXEKxCp30bB.jpg Dawid, Vanessa and Ludwig are the finalists at a pitch-competition for a movie about the German Rap phenomenon CRO. As the three youngsters work out their extraordinary film ideas, they must fight through unexpected personal challenges. Don't Believe the Hype
